CustomField.description: Standard: Footer will be right below question content, even if content is less or more. Sticky: Footer will stick to the bottom, other content will be scrollable.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Standard: The footer will be positioned directly beneath the question content, regardless of the content's length. Sticky: The footer will remain fixed at the bottom of the page, allowing other content to scroll above it.
CustomField.label: Footer Positioning
